description:
Hayashi asks for some advice from Lily, and from what Hayashi says, Sakurai starts to wonder if Hayashi and Moriko are the same person. Meanwhile, Moriko undergoes a makeover to prepare herself for her night out with Koiwai. But when the day finally comes, Koiwai doesn`t show up, even after Moriko spends so much time waiting. Just as she`s about to give up and go home, who does she run into?
Source: crunchyroll
